import React from'react';import'./StudentCard.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function StudentCard(_ref){let{student}=_ref;console.log('Student data in StudentCard:',student);if(!student){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:" Invalid student data "});}// Extract applications with a fallback to an empty array
const applications=student.Applications||[];// Determine the card color based on the application statuses
const getStatusColor=applications=>{if(applications.some(app=>app.ApplicationStatus==='Placed')){return{background:'#9ae59a',// Green for placed
border:'green'};}else if(applications.some(app=>app.ApplicationStatus==='Shortlisted')){return{background:'#ffc266',// Orange for shortlisted
border:'orange'};}else if(applications.some(app=>app.ApplicationStatus==='Not placed')){return{background:'#ff8080',// Red for not placed
border:'red'};}else if(applications.some(app=>app.ApplicationStatus==='Applied')){return{background:'white',// White for applied
border:'white'};}return{background:'#ffffff',// Default white background
border:'#dee2e6'// Default border color
};};const{background,border}=getStatusColor(applications);// Get the color for the current status
return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"student-card",style:{backgroundColor:background,borderColor:border,transition:'all 0.3s ease'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:[" ",student.Name," "]})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[" Reg No: ",student.Reg_No," "]})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[" School: ",student.School," "]})," "]});}export default StudentCard;
